backend/main.mo: Canister actor managing access control, storage mixins, venture groups, users, financial records, and automatic milestone generation via crop templates.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report listing frontend files, components, and test IDs linked to two money-handling and dashboard-consistency features.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries describing behavior and purpose of key frontend components, pages, hooks, and styles for documentation or build planning.
frontend/index.html: Minimal HTML entry page mounting the React app and loading src/main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Top-level React component handling authentication state, routing between pages, and navigation to group detail and group dashboard views.
frontend/src/components/AddContributionD: Dialog for members to submit new contributions, parsing money input to cents and posting data via useAddContribution.
frontend/src/components/AddExpenseDialog: Dialog for adding group expenses with category selection, money-to-cents parsing, optional receipt image upload, and backend submission.
frontend/src/components/AddMilestoneDial: Form dialog for creating a milestone with name, description, date, optional image, and submission via useAddMilestone.
frontend/src/components/AddPlannedPaymen: Dialog to schedule a planned payment for a group member, including amount, due date, description, and member selection.
frontend/src/components/AddRevenueDialog: Form dialog to record revenue with source, amount, date, and description, submitting via useAddRevenue.
frontend/src/components/CreateGroupDialo: Dialog for creating a new venture group with crop template support, contribution settings, and date fields.
frontend/src/components/Footer.tsx: Simple footer displaying copyright and a link to caffeine.ai.
frontend/src/components/Header.tsx: Responsive header with navigation, authentication handling, group breadcrumb, and mobile menu support.
frontend/src/components/MyPlannedPayment: Displays the user's planned payments, grouping them into overdue and upcoming and rendering each with status badges.
frontend/src/components/PayoutCalculator: Calculates and displays payout suggestions for a group and allows admins to mark member payouts as paid.
frontend/src/components/PlannedPaymentsS: Shows a group's planned payments sorted by status and allows admins to add new planned payments.
frontend/src/components/ProfileSetupModa: Modal for new users to enter and submit profile details including name, country, and optional phone.
frontend/src/components/ReceiptModal.tsx: Modal for viewing and downloading an uploaded receipt image tied to an expense.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages the authenticated or anonymous backend actor, refreshing dependent queries on identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity authentication context, handling login, stored identity loading, and identity lifecycle.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Provides many React Query hooks for fetching and mutating user profiles, venture groups, crop templates, and various group-related data via the backend actor.
frontend/src/index.css: Sets Tailwind base styles and defines extensive CSS variables for light and dark themes.
frontend/src/lib/money.ts: Utility functions for formatting, parsing, and validating money values stored as cents.
frontend/src/lib/moneyMath.ts: Provides helpers for summing cent values and calculating percentages while staying in cents.
Empty placeholder file for expense amount normalization logic.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Application entry point initializing React, React Query, Internet Identity, and global styles.
frontend/src/pages/Contributions.tsx: Displays and manages user contributions across venture groups, including filtering, totals, and deletion.
frontend/src/pages/Dashboard.tsx: Shows an overview of user-related venture group stats, profile greeting, and planned payments.
frontend/src/pages/GroupDashboard.tsx: Renders detailed dashboard for a specific venture group including finances, milestones, and activity.
frontend/src/pages/GroupDetail.tsx: Detailed group view showing contributions, expenses, milestones, revenues, progress, and admin actions with dialogs and deletion support.
frontend/src/pages/LandingPage.tsx: Public landing page with marketing content, feature highlights, and login CTA via Internet Identity.
frontend/src/pages/Milestones.tsx: Displays milestones for selected user groups, including status counts and filtering based on membership.
frontend/src/pages/MyGroups.tsx: Lists user-admin and member groups, supports searching, joining groups, and navigating to group details.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Helpers for reading, storing, and clearing URL and session parameters, including hash-based routing support.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration defining theme extensions, custom colors, animations, and plugin setup.
project_state.json: Tracks project state for fixing a currency formatting regression where dashboard displays added zeros; includes existing features, pending requests, and notes ensuring amounts use raw cent values with correct display conversion.
